content:
I will call the `Literature` agent to search for information about the DNA sequencing protocol.
The `Literature` agent is a tool that can search the local database of scientific papers for answers to specific questions. I will use it to find a suitable protocol for DNA sequencing, which is the goal of the current stage.

I will fill in the `questions` parameter with "What is the protocol for DNA sequencing?". I am asking this question to get a general protocol for DNA sequencing. This will give me a good starting point for generating a detailed experimental procedure.

I will fill in the `experiment_name` parameter with "DNA Sequencing". This will help the agent to narrow down the search to the relevant experiment.

questions: What is the protocol for DNA sequencing?
